website_summaries.verdict: The Klipsch Reference Over-Ear headphones deliver a clear, balanced audio experience.
pros: Accurate sound signature with bright highs and rich, but not exaggerated, bass response
Removable cable with inline remote control
cons: Not for those seeking big bass

customer_reviews.title: Overall these are pretty nice headphones (although they should be for the price)
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are pretty nice headphones (although they should be for the price). I would of probably given them a 4 before I noticed today that the plastic is breaking. See photo. I think someone else complained about this when I bought them but I thought perhaps they had been rough with them or something. I bought these back in May and have had them in the same location pretty much the whole time. Beyond the plastic cracking I would take a star off for the fact that the bass is pretty low out of the box. I use an EQ app to improve it and with that it sounds pretty well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Already Broken When I Opened the Box
customer_reviews.text: These headphones had the same problem that so many other users have complained about; the plastic shroud that holds the screws where the ear piece can be extended down was broken when I opened the box. I had read so many negative reviews because of that exact problem that I emailed the seller, New and Renew Electronics asking about it and if Klipsch had fixed the problem but the reply that I received didn't say anything about the headphone being improved only "if there's a problem, send them back". Well the return has been started without ever listening to the headphones BOA (broken on arrival). Shame on you New and Renew Electronics and Amazon for selling such a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Original cracked & replacement cracked
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers mentioned, these will crack where the screws are on both ears. It happened to my original pair and Kilpsch replaced them, but the replacement pair also cracked in the same exact spot. This is clearly a faulty product and should not be in consideration for your purchase. Such a shame and failure for a company with other great products, as these headphones are trash when it comes to quality. If you purchase these knowing theyll crack like ours, then you only have yourself to blame on that silly decision.
customer_reviews.author: Ithaca is Gorges

customer_reviews.title: Terrible build quality, but great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned these for just over 2 years and they are litterally falling apart. The material used to cover the headphones looks like it was simply hot glued into place in the factory and is now peeling off. For what I paid for these I would expect them to hold up longer. They still sound great and have good battery life, and are pretty comfortable. I can only give these two stars because they are falling apart after 2 years of use in an office.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dial

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and great sounding BT headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional post audio mixer in LA and I've been looking for an accurate set up on ear bluetooth headphones. I've been through a few pairs and tried many in the stores. These are the best I've tried and I love them. Very comfortable and they sound great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok but has a faulty design
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these headphones. Klipsch customer service did replace them for me so I give them credit for that, but like everyone else has said the plastic piece constantly cracks and falls off. I am very careful with them and when they are not on my head they are on a hook or back in their case. Each pair has lasted around 5-8 months for me before they have started to crack or the pads rip and fall off. I would highly recommend looking at a different set of headphones, its obviously a issue with manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P.

customer_reviews.title: klipsch over ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: As a 40 year customer of klipsch Heritage speaker products (8+pairs) I was very dissapointed in these headphones. They were uncomfortable and the sound quality unimpressive. I exchanged them for Sennheiser HD 660's which are the best I have heard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Punchy but need breaking in!
customer_reviews.text: While the high end was extreme, the overall frequency response is mellowing out! I will review again because I sense these need som break-in time. Betcha in a month, they’ll be awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound...Make sure to break them in!
customer_reviews.text: Once the headphones had about 8 hours of break-in, the were great. I little stale out of the box so don't judge these until they are broken in. I have a pair of Audio-Technica ATH-WS1100iS, Audio-Technica ATH-MSR7GM, an older set of Klipsch Reference, and several M50's. These compare well to the older reference ones and the M50's.Very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Highdensity3

customer_reviews.title: ... the around ear Bluetooth version and the sound is fantastic and so is the comfort as I've stated before ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got these along with the around ear Bluetooth version and the sound is fantastic and so is the comfort as I've stated before these are the best Bluetooth headphones I've purchased, also easy to pair with my I phone thanks klipsch another home run!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Huston

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Had them for awhile the sound and quality are outstanding. If all you want to hear is a load bass buy something else if you want to hear the music as it was recorded buy these. I have had zero problems I would recommend these to anybody that wants a quality set of on ear head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but poor frame quality
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a set of Klipsch headphones.. got them and the sound was very good, second to none, and the earpads very comfortable too, the problem though is that the quality of the frame construction and some materials are not the best, I was pretty sad that I had to return them, because they sound really good, but something came loose either on the frame or some other part close to the left speaker, kind of annoying since I didn't drop the set or anything...
customer_reviews.author: George McGilson

customer_reviews.title: Solid crisp beautiful music wire free.
customer_reviews.text: Forget about Beats. These headphones are for the real music listeners. Completely bluetooth. Memory foam. and not that god awful bang bang bang of way to much bass. Klipsch is know for their high performance studio and home theater speakers and these are just as good. Solid crisp beautiful music wire free.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pearse

customer_reviews.title: Good audio, poor ear cup extension
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough one. The audio is great, the ear cushions are very comfortable, but the top head piece is way to padded and the ear cup sliders do not adjust very much, so if you have a big head these do not fit. I had to return them because even at the longest extension they wouldn't fit on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound but....
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. They are up there with Bose. I like Klipsch's better. The design flaw is real. The headphones sound so good that I purchased all three models of them over the past few years. He Image Ones, the Image One Bluetooth and these. The design flaw happens in all of them. Because of that, I think these headphones should be $150. That way, you could splurge on a three or four year warranty because you're going to need them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great listening experience, great price, bulky travel case.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfort, look. Much "thicker" zipper travel case than previous Klipsch headphones, so a bit more awkward in a briefcase or travel-pack... bulky and therefore might be less convenient depending upon the nature and size of your other gear.
customer_reviews.author: AGH

customer_reviews.title: Great sound as always from Klipsch
customer_reviews.text: Great sound that is not exaggerated. I have found many head phones pump the bass up which is not what anyone other than kids are looking for. Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an old school audiophile. These are the best headphones I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tim 77

customer_reviews.title: Best on ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Balanced sound. Extraordinary detail and clarity for bluetooth headphones. Very comfy for on ear form factor. Wide soundstage. Well designed and made Cons: Not much. To nitpick - bluetooth range is only average and ears got slightly warm after long periods of hearing
customer_reviews.author: Balaji

customer_reviews.title: I thought they would be good for phone calls on my computer in bluetooth mode
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth is really sketchy with these headphones. If you turn your head, you sometimes lose contact with your device. I thought they would be good for phone calls on my computer in bluetooth mode. They are not. Also, the plastic parts that connect the headband to the headphones broke on both sides, in the same place. I used to really like this brand, but is seems like quality has gone way downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have anc....big disappointment!!!! GREAT max. volume level!!! Comfortable for long term use....like 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Wnderful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: On off switch and blue tooth switch was hard to get used to. Sound is absolutely perfect. Like being there. Rob
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Robert C Walker III

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding headphones I have ever owned (or heard)
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding headphones I have ever owned (or heard). As expected from any Klipsch product. Very natural sound, comfortable for extended periods of listening. Bass is just right, not overwhelming. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not an authorized reseller
customer_reviews.text: Apparently they're not an authorized reseller of Klipsch products -- beware! My headphones broke at the 6 month mark and can not be repaired by Klipsch or by Hugo. Disappointing for such expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Claire G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity in classical instrumental & vocal music
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clarity in classical instrumental & vocal music. Blue tooth connections with TV , iPad & iPhone work well. Comfortable & long duration between charges. Comparable to Boss but cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth Headphones I have heard in a while. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: good product though
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling is the biggest downfall great quality very comfortable great battery life (20) hours great distance (33 feet) talking on the phone works great. Quality of sound is good and clear but lacks Bass
customer_reviews.author: Jared Carvell

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!  Developed cracks and stopped working after 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Within three months these headphones developed a crack in the plastic. A month later they stopped working entirely. Wouldn't turn on or charge. I wish I had returned them immediately because they are also super bulky and the functionality of the buttons is poorly designed. Sadly I waited too long and the company would not issue a refund. They did give me a new set via the warranty, but it looks the same and will likely break again. The warranty is only one year. I'm really disappointed because this is the most expensive purchase i've made in the last 5 years at least. It honestly feels really fraudulent- to charge someone so much money for such a cheap product!
customer_reviews.author: pleasantries

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that fact that my headphones arrived quickly and they worked. They do a good job cancelling environmental sounds and they came in a handy case which can be used to keep all parts together
customer_reviews.author: Maria G. Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw with plastic housing.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said the sound is great but the plastic housing on both sides broke. What that does is make it impossible to adjust size.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Malyshev

customer_reviews.title: Not a approved Klipsch Vendor
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are excellent although, mine broke a month ago. I contacted Klipsch for warranty work and, regretfully, this is not an approved vendor. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: but had better sound than my Bose
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were very stiff and uncomfortable, but had better sound than my Bose. I gave them to me Son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: 20 months before they crap out
customer_reviews.text: They were great while they worked. Judging by my experience you’ll get 20 months before they fail to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford E. Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They r amazing in high frequencies & bass is tight without dominating the overall sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: p.kiran kumar

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound which is the first expected quality Less comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound which is the first expected quality Less comfortable more bulky than my previous pair of Klipsch headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I had Bose, Beats and none can come back the best headphones I can’t wait to get their thx ultra 2 home theater
customer_reviews.author: Barrington R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headphones you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth headphones you can buy. You will here sound that other headphones can't produce. Also they are comfortable to wear for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mykal Hamner

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really comfortable & sound great for vocals. I don’t listen to rap, but do listen to rock & Jazz. Bass is a little light & high are just right, no fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Aclin

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely comfortable and light very easy to pair and seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and light very easy to pair and seem to be well built as you would expect from klipsch but surprisingly to me was the great full volume they produce unlike Bluetooth headphones I've tried in the past klipsch has definitely hit another home run im very impressed, I can't find these anywhere I live to I must thank Amazon for offering these, go wireless and rock on a must for those considering Bose wireless these are much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Huston

customer_reviews.title: Comfort AND high quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Superior sound quality as you would expect from Klipsch and exceptional wearability
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kwame J. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: WOW..... finally there is a bluetooth headphone that sounds so clear and  pleasant
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are great for every type of music. Headphones sounds very natural without overpowering bass unlike any other bass orientated headphones this days. Do your self a favor and purchase this headphone and you will enjoy your music for years to come. There is great review on youtube just search" Klipsch Reference Over-Ear bluetooth headphones". I am not affiliated with this youtube reviewer in any way, just came across to this great review[...]
customer_reviews.author: ks0002

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great. Sound is good and headphones are great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: VW1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones, truly excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, truly excellent. Bass is warm and full, mids nice and flat, high's crisp and sparkly. Not sold as such but outside sound isolation is remarkably good! Probably shouldn't wear these while driving because of that. Very comfortable to wear even for extended listening. Detachable cord a huge plus, most 'broken' headphones are only because of a stressed/worn out cable connection.
customer_reviews.author: Wixiban

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the sales pitch, very thin sounding
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality, good top end...NO BOTTOM end. I bought them knowing full well how Klipsch headpones in general have a slightly tucked bottom ....but this is a joke right?
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not BOSE but great - My granddaughter has taken a shine to them - May need another pair
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Hi

customer_reviews.title: Does pair easy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks the part but, I feel its over priced for what it is. Volume doesn't seem to go high enough either. Does pair easy.
customer_reviews.author: BdcA

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good. Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in January of this year. The foam has fallen out of the ear pads and adjustable straps are also coming apart. Sound quality is good. Very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: cec6

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound level just wasn't what I expected. I returned these and bought my Sony Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: None ya

customer_reviews.title: This headphone is for iphone, ipod and ipad. ...
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is for iphone,ipod and ipad. if you are android user don't buy it. I only found out the hard way after it was delivered and I spent countless hours to pair it to my note 5
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Just received these and like the previous reviewer
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and like the previous reviewer, shocked to find there is absolutely no bass response in the headphones. My Klipsh s4i II in-ear phones I use for the gym have more bass response. Very disappointed - they actually sound defective. These are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: ... say these new headphones from klipsch are not very good I had a old pair from 2012 and those ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of headphones beats boss jvc and I can say these new headphones from klipsch are not very good I had a old pair from 2012 and those were very good no bass in the new news please if you can get the old models
customer_reviews.author: steve b

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money if you want true sound reproduction and ...
customer_reviews.text: Underwhelming and kind of a tin box sound. Lacks bass and is truly disappointing. don't waste your money if you want true sound reproduction and spend a little more and get the Bose QC35 if over ear is your preference but then again you cant go wrong with Bose. I am truly disappointed with these Klipsch
customer_reviews.author: DBDNY

product_meta.title: Klipsch Reference Over-Ear Headphones (Black)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Reference Over-EarUsing Klipsch balanced dynamic (kbd) driver technology, the fully balanced drivers move like a piston and decrease distortion bringing the most authentic bass ever heard in an over-ear headphone. With Deep, comfortable ear cushions and high-end 40mm kbd dynamic drivers, Reference over-ear is the New benchmark for over-ear sound.
feature_bullets: Frequency response - 15Hz-20 Hz and Impedance - 32 ohms
